team.name: Harvey Mmangisa
team.bio: Harvey Mmangisa is a Malawian tech entrepreneur and founder of Octet Systems. His work focuses on cybersecurity, smart digital solutions, and practical IT innovation for businesses and communities. With a passion for empowering people through technology, Harvey builds systems that solve real problems in areas like web development, networking, AI awareness, and digital safety. He also drives tech education initiatives through trainings and awareness campaigns â€” helping more people in Malawi use technology confidently, safely, and productively.
